custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-EasyIllustrious is a custom node suite to make working with Illustrious models easier and more intuitive

custom_nodes.author: firetheft
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Local_Lora_Gallery
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that provides a visual gallery for managing and applying multiple LoRA models.

custom_nodes.author: lucasgattas
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI · Egregora Audio Super‑Resolution
custom_nodes.description: High‑quality music audio enhancement for ComfyUI: FlashSR super‑resolution + Fat Llama spectral enhancement (GPU & CPU).

custom_nodes.author: jfcantu
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Prompt Companion
custom_nodes.description: A node that lets you save and reuse parts of prompts (embeddings, quality keywords, and so on.)

custom_nodes.author: FloyoAI
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Seed API Integration
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom nodes for Seed AI APIs including video generation, image generation, and chat models

custom_nodes.author: Olaf Reitmaier Veracierta
custom_nodes.title: Olaf's Nodes
custom_nodes.description: NODES: ORvTextEncoderGoogleEmbeddingGemma3, ORvEmbeddingsHeatmap, ORvEmbeddingsSpectrogram, ORvStringConsoleDebug

custom_nodes.author: duldduld
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_md5
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom nodes to covert string/image/file to md5 hash

custom_nodes.author: jtydhr88
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-StableStudio
custom_nodes.description: A practical plug‑in that adds a StableStudio style user interface to ComfyUI. This project aims to give you a clean, responsive UI for managing StableStudio features inside ComfyUI, without complicating your workflow. It focuses on reliability, speed, and a calm, uncluttered design that helps you work faster.

custom_nodes.author: ApexArtist
custom_nodes.title: Apex Artist - Image Resize
custom_nodes.description: Professional image resizing node with 6 advanced algorithms, intelligent aspect ratio handling, crop/pad options, and batch processing support. Perfect for AI workflows, photography, and digital art.

custom_nodes.author: Seth A. Robinson
custom_nodes.title: Workflow to API Converter Endpoint
custom_nodes.description: Adds a global /workflow/convert API endpoint to convert non-API workflow formats to API format for ComfyUI execution

custom_nodes.author: orion4d
custom_nodes.title: Gemini Nano Banana for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This project is a custom node for ComfyUI that integrates the power of the Google Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (“Nano Banana”) API. It provides a single versatile node, the Gemini Nano Banana, which allows you to perform image generation and editing operations directly within your workflows.

custom_nodes.author: orion4d
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI EncryptMaster
custom_nodes.description:
ComfyUI node pack for encrypting and hiding text or images.
Security: AES-256-GCM (authenticated) with scrypt key derivation.
Steganography: LSB (PNG/TIFF) and DCT/JPEG (more robust to recompression).

custom_nodes.author: leylahkrell
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Violet Tools
custom_nodes.description: A collection of aesthetic-focused custom nodes for ComfyUI that enhance AI image generation with sophisticated style and prompt management capabilities. Includes 7 nodes: Aesthetic Alchemist (style blending with 20+ curated aesthetics), Quality Queen (quality prompts), Glamour Goddess (hair/makeup), Body Bard (body features), Pose Priestess (positioning), Encoding Enchantress (text processing), and Negativity Nullifier (negative prompts). Features weighted blending, randomization, and modular YAML-based configuration.

custom_nodes.author: SnJake
custom_nodes.title: JPG & Noise Remover for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This is a custom node for ComfyUI designed to remove JPEG compression artifacts and digital noise from images. It is powered by a lightweight UNetRestorer model that efficiently restores image quality.

custom_nodes.author: SatadalAI
custom_nodes.title: SATA UtilityNode Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A collection of utility nodes including image upscale,touchpad support and CSV-driven prompt machine for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Flux Pro Integrative - Enhanced Flux API Node
custom_nodes.description: A completely rewritten and enhanced custom node for ComfyUI that integrates with Black Forest Labs FLUX API, providing seamless access to FLUX's image generation and finetuning capabilities with improved reliability and user experience.

custom_nodes.author: CoreyCorza
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-CRZnodes
custom_nodes.description: Dashboard Nodes for Comfy

custom_nodes.author: wizdroid
custom_nodes.title: Wizdroid ComfyUI Outfit Selection
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive outfit generation system for ComfyUI with AI-powered prompt enhancement and dynamic outfit composition.

custom_nodes.author: Vantage with AI
custom_nodes.title: Vantage-HunyuanFoley
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node for generating high-fidelity, synchronized foley audio for any video, powered by Tencent’s HunyuanVideo-Foley model.

custom_nodes.author: MilleN2ium
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-CutomizableSave
custom_nodes.description: save your image with customized naming rule

custom_nodes.author: Justify87
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Multi-Analysis Heatmaps
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node for visual comparison of two images using multiple perceptual and mathematical methods. The goal: make hidden differences visible as colorful heatmaps, so you can see where an upscaler, denoiser, or diffusion model changed your image — even when your eyes can’t tell at first glance.

custom_nodes.author: iguanesolutions
custom_nodes.title: Flux Resolution
custom_nodes.description: Get the closest compatible flux resolution from a given resolution.

custom_nodes.author: matthewfriedrichs
custom_nodes.title: Thought Bubble
custom_nodes.description: ThoughtBubble is a custom node for ComfyUI that provides an interactive canvas to build and manage your prompts in a more visual and organized way. Think of it as a whiteboard for your ideas, allowing you to link different concepts, create conditional logic, and dynamically generate prompts using a powerful set of commands.

custom_nodes.author: opparco
custom_nodes.title: Wan2.2 Lightx2v Scheduler for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node package designed specifically for Wan2.2 Lightx2v models to fix the 'burnt-out' look, over-sharpening, and abrupt lighting shifts through proper denoising trajectory alignment.

custom_nodes.author: FredBisAI
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI FRED Nodes v2
custom_nodes.description: FRED's enhanced custom nodes for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI IC-Custom Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that integrates IC-Custom model for high-quality image customization and generation.

custom_nodes.author: polygoningenieur
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-IC-Light-Video
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI native nodes for IC-Light with a Video node

custom_nodes.author: sumitchatterjee13
custom_nodes.title: Nuke Nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive collection of ComfyUI custom nodes that replicate the functionality of popular Nuke compositing nodes. Includes merge, grade, transform, blur nodes and more for professional compositing workflows.

custom_nodes.author: Yeq6X
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Image to Video Inserter
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that inserts images into videos.

custom_nodes.author: yichengup
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_SwiftCut
custom_nodes.description: A simple ComfyUI plugin that Its purpose and function is to replicate some of the editing effects of capcut,jianying and pr.

custom_nodes.description: Load media (image/video/audio) from remote URL

custom_nodes.description: A small, practical bundle of ComfyUI nodes that streamlines common workflows.

custom_nodes.author: Frief84
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LoRAWeightAxisXY
custom_nodes.description: Adds `XY Input: LoRA Weight (simple)` for Efficiency Nodes. Outputs XY subtype 'LoRA' (name, weight, weight) with a linear sweep; works with `XY Input: Checkpoint`.

custom_nodes.author: penposs
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Banana-Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI that generates images using Google’s Gemini 2.5 Flash Image Preview API.

custom_nodes.author: PenguinTeo
custom_nodes.title: GeminiBanana for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: GeminiBanana is a custom node for ComfyUI based on the Gemini API. It allows you to call Gemini inside ComfyUI workflows to generate text, parse images, or perform multimodal interactions, greatly enhancing workflow automation and creative capabilities.

custom_nodes.author: grovergol
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Grover Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A custom node that allows opening file paths in the default system file explorer.

custom_nodes.author: noelkim12
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ComfyUI-NoelTextUtil
custom_nodes.description: Text utility nodes for file path and LoRA auto triggering

custom_nodes.author: Juste-Leo2
custom_nodes.title: Canary-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This node pack integrates the core capabilities of the Canary-1b-v2 model, providing three main features: it can transcribe audio in any of 25 supported languages into text in the same language, translate audio from 24 source languages directly into English, and translate English audio directly into one of the 24 other supported languages.

custom_nodes.author: otavanopisto
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-aihub-workflow-exposer
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for ComfyUI in order to expose AI workflows to external applications (particularly image, video and audio editors) so workflows can be integrated as plugins

custom_nodes.author: D3lUX3I
custom_nodes.title: VideoPromptEnhancer
custom_nodes.description: This node generates a professional prompt from an input text for modern video AI models (e.g., Alibaba Wan 2.2) via the OpenRouter API.

custom_nodes.author: dasilva333
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI HunyuanVideo-Foley Custom Node
custom_nodes.description: This custom node integrates the HunyuanVideo-Foley model for generating audio from video frames and text prompts in ComfyUI. It's built for use in generating Foley sounds from video and text inputs.

custom_nodes.author: aistudynow
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-HunyuanFoley
custom_nodes.description: Generate Audio from any video and or text

custom_nodes.author: mengqin
custom_nodes.title: Unet Bnb Model Loader
custom_nodes.description: A general comfyui model loading plugin that supports loading unet models quantized in bnb-4bit (nf4 and fp4) format

custom_nodes.author: Artificial-Sweetener

custom_nodes.description: A nodepack designed to help you work with video from within ComfyUI that specializes in handling image batches efficiency and creating video loops.

custom_nodes.author: hujuying
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI ModelScope API Node
custom_nodes.description: This is a universal custom node for ComfyUI that supports both Text-to-Image and Image-to-Image generation by calling various models via the official ModelScope API.

custom_nodes.author: itsjustregi

custom_nodes.description: Bring Microsoft's POML (Prompt Orchestration Markup Language) to your ComfyUI workflows! Create structured, reusable, and powerful prompts with visual node-based editing.

custom_nodes.author: Urabewe
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Video Extend Counter
custom_nodes.description: A simple utility node that counts active Video S2V Extend nodes in your workflow and returns that number plus one. Now you don't have to remember to update the batch number. Just set your extend nodes and go. It was easy to forget so I made this quick and dirty.

custom_nodes.author: Juste-Leo2
custom_nodes.title: USO Nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description:
Custom nodes to integrate the USO image generation model (based on FLUX.1 by ByteDance) into ComfyUI.
This project is an implementation based on the official source code from the [a/ByteDance/USO](https://github.com/bytedance/USO) repository.

custom_nodes.author: daehwa
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-NanoBananaAPI
custom_nodes.description: Creates images using the NanoBanana API. To use it, you must enter your issued API key.

custom_nodes.author: GsusGG
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-CozyGen
custom_nodes.description: A set of custom nodes and aiohttp server for a simple ComfyUI browser and mobile device experience for any t2i image workflow.

custom_nodes.author: annewj023
custom_nodes.title: Google Nano
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node based on OpenRouter that supports calling the Google Gemini model via the OpenAI API to generate new images from reference images and prompts.

custom_nodes.author: Ltamann
custom_nodes.title: FastVLM-7B ComfyUI Node
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-FastVLM-7B Apple A custom node for Apple’s FastVLM-7B vision-language model. This node lets you pass an image + instruction and returns a generated text response.
